hero.title: Let’s start afresh together
hero.content: Living a normal life once again is possible. Immuni helps us reach this goal faster and without compromising our privacy.

cta.span: Help yourself, your family, and your country.

feats.title: An extra tool to fight the epidemic
feats.content: Immuni is an app that helps us fight the COVID-19 epidemic. The app uses technology to alert the users who have had a risky exposure—even if they are asymptomatic.

benefits.title: Protection for ourselves and our loved ones
benefits.isolation: Users who have been notified by the app that they may have been infected can isolate themselves to avoid infecting other people. By doing so, they help contain the epidemic and speed up the return to a normal life.
benefits.oldPeople: By being alerted early, the users can contact their general practitioner and lower the risk of serious consequences.

tech.title: Innovation to serve the community
tech.content: The app sends a notification to those who were in close contact with a user positive to the COVID-19 virus, alerting them of the risk of infection. Also thanks to Bluetooth Low Energy technology, this takes place without the app gathering any data on the identity or the location of its users.

privacy.title: Your privacy is protected
privacy.content: Immuni has been designed and developed while taking great care to safeguard user privacy. Any data, collected and managed by the Ministry of Health and by public bodies, is stored on servers located in Italy. All the data and app connections with the server are protected.
privacy.subtitle: Immuni does not gather:

icons.data: Your first name, last name, or date of birth
icons.identity: The identity of the people you meet

faq.title: Want to know more?
faq.button: Take a look at the FAQ section

press.title: Graphics
press.content: Official graphic assets available for download
